sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.LASendsMessagePostProcessingInputProcessor</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>LASendsMessagePostProcessingInputProcessor</name> <script><![CDATA[/** * This is the input processor that creates one api feature requests for live agent message post processing. * 'input' in the methods below is a JSON which contains data required to create feature's request payload. * Example input - * { * "vendorId": "c2f0b8f187033200246ddd4c97cb0bb9", * "consumerAccountId": "bb225017c3742110634cdb450a40dd83", * "deviceType": "mweb", * "conversationId": "42591817c3302110634cdb450a40dda7", * "csMessageId": "5179d817c3302110634cdb450a40ddd2", * "text": "message from the agent" * ... * ... * } * * NOTE: If you want to change/add inputs, you can do so in the feature's input processor. * It is recommended that this service plan input processor remains default. * Example feature request processor - <hosturl>/now/nav/ui/classic/params/target/sys_script_include.do%3Fsys_id%3Da65b5b2653f60110a260ddeeff7b1266 */ var LASendsMessagePostProcessingInputProcessor = Class.create(); LASendsMessagePostProcessingInputProcessor.prototype = { initialize: function() { },
process: function(input) { return input; },
shouldPause: function(input) { return false; },
type: 'LASendsMessagePostProcessingInputProcessor' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-02-08 17:56:42</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5c0397c7c3302110634cdb450a40dd0c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>LASendsMessagePostProcessingInputProcessor</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Glide Conversation Server" source="com.glide.cs">ad7df0203c75311068bcf327dfe37f75</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5c0397c7c3302110634cdb450a40dd0c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-02-04 17:24:38</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
